title: Henchir el Khaway
description: Henchir el Khaway is located on the southwest coast of the island of Djerba, in the northwest outskirts of modern Tunisian village of Guellala. The settlement here was founded at least as early as the fifth century BCE. Its longevity and development are attested by archaeological evidence (both terrestrial and maritime/submerged) dating well into late antiquity.

properties.description: Centerpoint of ancient site after Ben Tahar 2019 Figure 1 (page 73). Dates after Ben Tahar 2019.
properties.title: Imagery Location: Centerpoint of ancient site
